org.magicdgs.readtools.cmd.argumentcollections

Class RTOutputArgumentCollection

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.magicdgs.readtools.cmd.argumentcollections.RTOutputArgumentCollection
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    RTOutputBamArgumentCollection, RTOutputBamSplitArgumentCollection, RTOutputFastqArgumentCollection

    public abstract class RTOutputArgumentCollection
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    Abstract class for all output arguments in ReadTools.
    See Also:

    • Method Detail

      • getWriterFactory

        public ReadWriterFactory getWriterFactory()
        Gets a fresh default factory. Note: this factory may be used for extra outputs that are not part of the argument collection. For instance, if a discarded output is requested. Otherwise, use outputWriter(SAMFileHeader, Supplier, boolean, File). Implementations should call the super method to honor the common arguments.

      • outputWriter

        public final org.broadinstitute.hellbender.utils.read.GATKReadWriter outputWriter(htsjdk.samtools.SAMFileHeader header,
                                                                                  java.util.function.Supplier<htsjdk.samtools.SAMProgramRecord> programRecord,
                                                                                  boolean presorted,
                                                                                  java.io.File referenceFile)
        Gets the output writer for the arguments. Note: it uses validateUserOutput() to assess that the output parameter is valid before creation.
        Parameters:
        header - the header for the output file.
        programRecord - program record supplier. May be null, but should not return null.
        presorted - if true, the output is assumed to be pre-sorted.
        referenceFile - the reference file for CRAM output. May be null.
        Throws:
        org.broadinstitute.hellbender.exceptions.UserException - if the output could not be created.

      • getOutputNameWithSuffix

        public abstract java.lang.String getOutputNameWithSuffix(java.lang.String suffix)
        Gets a new output name using a suffix with the current parameters.

      • makeMetricsFile

        public abstract java.nio.file.Path makeMetricsFile(java.lang.String suffix)
        Gets a new metrics file for output using a suffix. If the suffix is null, it is not used.

      • validateUserOutput

        public abstract void validateUserOutput()
        Validates the user output of the
        Throws:
        org.broadinstitute.hellbender.exceptions.UserException - if the user output is not valid.

      • createWriter

        protected abstract org.broadinstitute.hellbender.utils.read.GATKReadWriter createWriter(ReadWriterFactory factory,
                                                                                        htsjdk.samtools.SAMFileHeader header,
                                                                                        boolean presorted)
        Creates the writer with the provided factory, updated header and presorted.
        Parameters:
        factory - the factory to use for get the output writer.
        header - the header for the output file (already updated).
        presorted - if true, the output is assumed to be pre-sorted.

      • updateHeader

        protected abstract void updateHeader(htsjdk.samtools.SAMFileHeader header,
                                     java.util.function.Supplier<htsjdk.samtools.SAMProgramRecord> programRecord)
        Updates the header if necessary.

      • defaultOutput

        public static final RTOutputArgumentCollection defaultOutput()
        Returns the default output collection for ReadTools (only SAM/BAM/CRAM files).

      • fastqOutput

        public static final RTOutputArgumentCollection fastqOutput()
        Returns the a collection for output FASTQ files.

      • splitOutput

        public static final RTOutputArgumentCollection splitOutput()
        Returns an output collection for SAM/BAM/CRAM files and splitting them.
